tool_description: A dictionary translator to translate 60K+ English words to 50+ languages. The result include word proficiency, phonetics, spell audios, part of speech tags and translations.
name: English Word Translator API
title: English Word Translator API

api_list.name: audio
languages
api_list.description: Get all supported language names, codes and native names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://english-word-translator-api.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-word-translator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://english-word-translator-api.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-word-translator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
